main_definition: To create or shape something by putting parts together; also, to develop a new organization or group.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To physically assemble or arrange objects into an organized structure.
meanings_and_examples.example: The workers were forming the metal rods into the desired shape.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To develop a group of people with shared goals, interests, or activities over time.
meanings_and_examples.example: A new book club is forming among avid readers in our community.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To create something abstract like an idea, plan, or policy from separate components.
meanings_and_examples.example: The committee was tasked with forming a comprehensive strategy for the upcoming project.
